text: The ' (CSM, Superior Naval Council) was an advisory body to the Minister of the Navy that was formed on 5 December 1889.Guelton, pp. 58–59 It consisted of the Chief of the Naval Staff, the (Director of Equipment), the and various admirals. "The CSM advised the minister on the military characteristics of new designs and drew up the staff requirements including displacement, offensive/defensive qualities, speed and endurance."Jordan & Caresse, p. 20 ==Citations== ==Bibliography== * * Category:French Navy Category:French military staff Category:French Third Republic Category:1889 establishments in France
title: Conseil supérieur de la Marine
